title: Four Seasons Chicken Curry
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 medium onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, sliced', '1 (2.5cm) piece fresh ginger, grated', '1 (2.5cm) piece stick cinnamon', '3 bay leaves', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 teaspoon coriander seeds', '1 teaspoon fenugreek seeds', '6 whole cloves', '6 whole cardamom pods', '1 teaspoon crushed red chilli flakes', '10 whole black peppercorns', '450g skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets - diced', '3 tablespoons curry powder', '350ml water, or as needed', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'salt and pepper to taste', '125ml single cream']
